name: Jay Walker: Rogue Pedestrian
description:
Jacqueline "Jay" Walker, thrill-seeker extraordinaire, has the mysterious ability to stop time whenever she stands still. She loves to flaunt the law, and does so... by jaywalking. Today, she tackles her greatest challenge yet: Megahighway 99.

Crossing the street sounds real easy with time-stopping powers, right? Think again! Traffic may start out smooth, but soon turns to rush hour. Good thing Jay's power lets her weave between cars in ways average pedestrians can only dream of.

WARNING: Jay Walker is a trained professional with supernatural powers. Do NOT try traffic-dodging at home!

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD

Code and concept by Fredison
Art by Pyromantic
Music and sound by Dmytro Nebesh
